name: Blood And Gourd
description:
"Carved, baked, and smashed. For generations, pumpkins have suffered under humanity, until one has had enough. Play as Jack and explore the farm to save your pump-kin, but be cautious - you’re not the only one who's out tonight."

Blood And Gourd is a student project organized in ten weeks. In this stealth-based light horror game, play as Jack the adorable jack-o-lantern as you collect keys and avoid hungry pigs. Will you escape or will you meet your untimely end in the jaws of Porkchop, Schnitzel, Bratwurst and Chris P. Bacon?

Headphones recommended.
